content: a while back i hosted a crochet-along for a long-legged grumpy cat 1 with videos and everything i do also have a pattern for a smaller version which i love making as a keychain 2 it s such a fun quick project if you need a gift for someone size 12 cm 4 3/4 from head to toe when crocheted with dk weight yarn and a 2 50 mm hook difficulty 2 beginner - suitable for novice crocheters includes small details copyright © 2014 kristi tullus tü spire all rights reserved please do not post this pattern to your website or blog instead post a link to https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/free-pattern-small-long-legged-kitty you may use this pattern as a teaching aid in any free class or e-course or as part of a free crochet pattern provided you credit me as the designer kristi tullus http //kristitullus com feel free to sell items made with this pattern 1 https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/cal-long-legged-cat-materials 2 https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/making-keychains
